page.title: 09A day in the life of .......
page.content: Obviously people from all walks of life live and work in Edenbridge. Some start their day quite early (about 6 am). They all have busy days; they start by going through the mail and chasing rep- resentatives. People with jobs of responsibility allocate their employees their jobs for the day. There are tight security checks made by the boses. Work for some finishes quite late (about 8.30pm). People interviewed all got a chance to meet the public. Sometimes they have to deal with the worse side of their jobs. They all have a certain of competition. There is always a lot of paper work to do, but technology is helping them, with such things like word-processors, computers,calculators etc., all of which are being introduced more and more into firms and shops.
